alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 6:18PM CDT until June 02 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wichita KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Cowskin Creek At Wichita At 119th Street affecting Sedgwick County. For the Cowskin Creek...including Wichita At 119th Street...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cowskin Creek At Wichita At 119th Street. * WHEN...From this evening to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Flood waters backup into residential yards southeast of river gage site along Lost Creek Circle and southeast of Central and Karren Streets. Flood waters begin to creep over 13th street in the low water spot about a half mile west of 119th Street. Expect typical flooding of low water crossings and low cropland areas as well as fields near the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:01 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 18.0 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Cowskin Creek Wichita At 119th Stree 18.0 18.0 Wed 6 pm CDT 15.0 9.9 8.1 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
